naslov: TROGIR - Drvenik Veliki, DUPLEX / 992m2 okućnice // VIDEO -čitaj opis (prodaja)
opis: - ekskluzivna prodaja agencije #adriaINgroup - kupac plaća agencijsku proviziju 3% od prodajne cijene Cijenjeni klijenti, razgled nekretnine moguć je isključivo uz potpisani posrednički ugovor koji je temelj za daljnje radnje vezane za kupoprodaju, a sve sukladno Zakonu o posredovanju u prometu nekretnina. NAPOMENA: na upit šaljemo detaljne slike i video interijera, eksterijera, okućnice... Želite li kupiti kuću na prekrasnom otoku u Dalmaciji, gdje možete uživati u miru, prirodi i moru? Onda je ova duplex kuća (prizemnica) na Drveniku Velom prava prilika za vas! Kuća se nalazi na južnoj strani otoka, samo stotinjak metara od plaže, s djelomičnim pogledom na more prema sjeveru. Prostrana parcela od 992m2 ograđena je predivnim mediteranskim raslinjem (masline, limun, lavanda...), koja takodjer budućem kupcu omogućava gradnju dodatnog sadržaja, kao što su bazen, pomoćni objekt, garaža... TEHNIČKI OPIS: + gradnja 1996.godine / zadnja adaptacija 2018.godine ( okućnica, namještaj i oprema... ) - kuća očuvana i održavana + brutto kvadratura: 84.79m2 ( stambeno 49,45m2 + natkrivena terasa 14.41m2 + terasa 7.37m2 / podrum 5.97m2 + ostava 7.59m2 ) + dvije odvojene građevinske parcele 992m2 .................................................................................... - kuća se sastoji od dvije spavaće sobe, dnevnog boravka s kuhinjom i blagovaonom, hodnika, kupatila, natkrivene terase i terase - kompletno opremljena i namještena - više parking mjesta .................................................................................... Kuća je idealna za odmor, ali i za iznajmljivanje turistima. Otok Drvenik Veli je miran i netaknut otok, s prekrasnim plažama, čistim morem i prirodnim ljepotama. Na otoku se nalaze restoran, konoba, trgovina i pošta. Do otoka se može doći trajektom ili brodom iz Trogira. / DETALJI NA UPIT / eng.............................. - exclusive sale of the agency #adriaINgroup - the buyer pays an agency commission of 3% of the sales price Dear clients, viewing the property is only possible with a signed brokerage contract, which is the basis for further actions related to the sale, and all in accordance with the Act on Brokerage in Real Estate Transactions. NOTE: upon request, we send detailed pictures and videos of the interior, exterior, garden... Do you want to buy a house on a beautiful island in Dalmatia, where you can enjoy peace, nature and the sea? Then this duplex house (ground floor) in Drvenik Velo is the right opportunity for you! The house is located on the south side of the island, only a hundred meters from the beach, with a partial view of the sea to the north. The spacious plot of 992 m2 is surrounded by beautiful Mediterranean plants (olives, lemons, lavender...), which also allows the future buyer to build additional facilities, such as a swimming pool, auxiliary building, garage... TECHNICAL DESCRIPTION: + construction in 1996 / last renovation in 2018 (garden, furniture and equipment...) - the house is preserved and maintained + gross square footage: 84.79m2 (residential 49.45m2 + covered terrace 14.41m2 + terrace 7.37m2 / basement 5.97m2 + storage room 7.59m2) + two separate building plots of 992m2 ................................................... ................................... - the house consists of two bedrooms, living room with kitchen and dining room, hallway, bathroom, covered terrace and terrace - fully equipped and furnished - more parking spaces ................................................... ................................... The house is ideal for vacation, but also for renting to tourists. The island of Drvenik Veli is a quiet and untouched island, with beautiful beaches, clear sea and natural beauty. There is a restaurant, tavern, shop and post office on the island. The island can be reached by ferry or boat from Trogir. / DETAILS ON REQUEST / #adriaINgroup real estate-consulting-design-development-VIP service ...............................................................
